member.name: M:CMS.Protection.Web.UI.CsrfProtection.IsVulnerableRequest(System.Web.HttpRequestBase)
member.summary: Indicates whether specified request should be checked for CSRF attack vulnerability.
member.remarks: Only POST requests which do not contain XMLHttpRequest HTTP header or PostBack requests detected by are considered as vulnerable. AJAX requests do not contain CSRF hidden field in the POST body therefore CSRF protection cannot be applied. All modern browsers deny cross-domain AJAX requests due to CORS implementation - CSRF is not possible.
member.returns: True if request should be checked; otherwise false.
